name: ULTRU
description:
You wake up in a strange space station armed only with your old blaster pistol... you can't remember anything... and pretty much everything is trying to kill you...

Find the main computer and hack it, then run for your life and escape in the elevator!

4 Procedurally generated levels + SECRET Boss level!!

4 Different weapons including a GRENADE LAUNCHER

Endless replayability!!

Made in in 1 month by Pablo Sarmiento and Martin Thomsen

Music by Minas Mendrinos
